TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CatalogPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part
Public MustInherit Class CatalogPart Inherits Part

summary.span: 用作位于 区域内的控件的基类，也用作向用户提供可添加到网页的可用 Web 服务器控件（具体说来即 控件）目录的控件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that reside in zones, and that provide catalogs of available Web server controls (especially controls) that users can add to a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是基类中驻留的特殊控件区域。The class is a base class for special controls that reside in zones. 这些派生控件提供的最终用户可添加到网页的 Web 服务器控件的目录。These derived controls provide catalogs of Web server controls that end users can add to a Web page. 使用中 Web 应用程序时你想要向最终用户提供灵活地更改网页的功能，通过添加或删除服务器控件的控件。Use controls in a Web application when you want to provide end users with the flexibility to change the functionality of a Web page by adding or removing server controls. 目录是只需一个或多个可用的 Web 服务器控件的列表 (包括控件、 ASP.NET 服务器控件和自定义或用户控件)，用户可以添加到 Web 页。A catalog is simply a list of one or more available Web server controls (including controls, ASP.NET server controls, and custom or user controls) that users can add to a Web page. 目录具有许多共同的特征，包括为最终用户; 的说明文本文本以描述每个服务器控件;若要选择的服务器控件并将其添加到页面; 的帮助器控件常见标头、 页脚和边框;和样式属性的数目。A catalog has a number of common characteristics, including instruction text for end users; text to describe each server control; helper controls to select the server controls and add them to the page; a common header, footer, and border; and a number of style attributes. 有三种类型的控件提供的 Web 部件控件集，如以下表中所述。There are three types of controls provided with the Web Parts control set, as described in the following table. 每种类型的控件包含从其他源添加到页服务器控件。Each type of control contains server controls that are added to a page from a different source. > [!IMPORTANT] > 继承的控件类派生自的区域中仅可以驻留类。Controls that inherit from the class can reside only in zones derived from the class. |控件Control|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||包含的控件在页上，已关闭，并可以由用户重新打开 （添加的回页面）。Contains controls that have been closed on a page, and that can be reopened (added back to the page) by users. 在这种目录控件是控件从其他源添加到页面，然后由用户关闭。The controls in this type of catalog are controls that were already added to the page from another source, and were then closed by a user.| ||包含服务器控件中声明控件，它本身包含在在 Web 页的标记中的区域。Contains server controls declared within a control, which is itself contained in a zone in the markup of a Web page.| ||控件的定义文件 （定义一个架构，它包含状态信息的 XML 文件） 上传到目录中，为用户提供用户界面 (UI)，以便该控件可以添加到 Web 页。Provides the user interface (UI) for a user to upload a control's definition file (an XML file defined by a schema, that contains state information) to a catalog, so that the control can be added to a Web page. 控件本身不会出现在此类型的目录;目录是只是用于访问外部控件的定义文件，因此将它们添加到页面的机制。The controls themselves do not appear in this type of catalog; the catalog is just a mechanism for accessing the definition files for external controls so they can be added to a page.| 类继承自基类类，以使其具有 Web 部件控件集内的其他部件控件的常见行为。The class inherits from the base class, so that it has the common behavior of other part controls in the Web Parts control set. 此外，它会添加一些可用于目录功能的成员。In addition, it adds some members that are useful for the catalog functionality. 属性获取当前为该控件的标题显示的实际字符串。The property gets the actual string that is currently being displayed as the title of the control. 此属性的值可以是相同的值属性或如果没有值已分配给该属性，由.NET Framework 提供的默认值。The value of this property can be the same as the value of the property or, if no value has been assigned to that property, a default value supplied by the .NET Framework. 并这两个属性提供了方便地访问控制的生命周期的两个基本对象控件：控件，并包含区域控件，分别。The and properties both provide convenient access to the two essential objects that control the life cycle of a control: the control, and the zone that contains the control, respectively. 类还包含几种方法。The class also contains several methods. 方法声明为抽象方法必须由继承者实现的。The method is declared as an abstract method that must be implemented by inheritors. 其用途是返回在目录中的控件说明的集合。Its intended purpose is to return a collection of descriptions of the controls in the catalog. 相关的方法， 、 也声明为抽象和必须由继承者实现。A related method, , is also declared as abstract and must be implemented by inheritors. 此方法应返回的一个实例控件基于传递给方法作为参数的说明。This method is intended to return an instance of a control based on a description that is passed to the method as a parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 类是抽象的因为它不在代码中直接使用。Because the class is abstract, it is not used directly in code. 但是，该示例演示如何使用派生的三个提供与 Web 部件控件集用来演示常见使用方案的控件。However, the example shows how to work with the three derived controls provided with the Web Parts control set to demonstrate common usage scenarios. 有四个部分的代码示例：There are four parts to the code example: - 使你能够更改的用户控件在网页上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - Web 页，其中包含三个提供与 Web 部件控件集，所有声明内的控件在网页上。A Web page, which contains the three controls provided with the Web Parts control set, all declared within a on a Web page. 此页还包含控件，与区域中声明的控件。The page also contains a control, with an control declared in the zone. - 一个包含引号中显示的 XML 文件在网页上的控件。An XML file that contains quotations displayed in the control on the Web page. - 如何运行该示例的说明。An explanation of how to run the example. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 应将此代码保存在名为 DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx 或 DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx （具体取决于哪种语言使用） 的文件。You should save this code in a file named DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx or DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx (depending on which language you are using). 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPart_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPart_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 代码示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 该页面包含控件，并且在子``元素，这三个控制提供与 Web 部件控件集声明。The page contains a control, and within the child `` element, each of the three controls provided with the Web Parts control set is declared. 上设置某些属性控件，也可在\<脚本 > 部分中的页上，该控件上的属性以编程方式访问。Some attribute are set on the control, and also in the \

span.para: 因为类是抽象的不能直接在网页上使用它。Web 部件控件集提供三种从基类派生控件 （在本主题的备注部分中的表中列出），并可在 Web 部件页上。这些控件应提供大部分创建的 Web 服务器控件目录所需的功能。但是，您可能拥有的专用需要开发自定义的需求控件。例如，可以创建一种特殊的使服务器控件可通过 Web 服务，或直接从数据库的控件。若要执行此操作，你必须从继承类。此外必须重写抽象并方法，以提供一个实现来返回或其他服务器控件和及其说明。您还需要加载从数据库或 Web 服务的各种服务器控件的方法。

Because the class is abstract, you cannot use it directly on a Web page. The Web Parts control set provides three controls (listed in the table in the Remarks section of this topic) that derive from the base class and that can be used on Web Parts pages. These controls should provide most of the features needed to create catalogs of Web server controls. However, you might have specialized needs that would require developing a custom control. For example, you can create a special type of control that makes server controls available through a Web service, or directly from a database. To do this, you must inherit from the class. You must also override the abstract and methods to provide an implementation that returns the or other server controls, and their descriptions. You will also need methods to load the various server controls from your database or Web service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayTitle As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayTitle { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，其中包含 控件的实际当前标题。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the actual current title of a control.

value.span: 一个表示控件的完整可见标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the complete, visible title of the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的当前值的基本属性或如果该控件没有标题，计算得出的值。The property returns either the current value of the base property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value. 属性设计为要在运行时获取实际显示的标题的当前值的只读的、 计算属性。The property is designed to be a read-only, calculated property to get the actual current value of the displayed title at run time. 因此，不应尝试使用此属性设置为标题控件。Therefore, you should not attempt to use this property to set a title for a control. 若要设置标题，请使用基属性。To set a title, use the base property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 在`

Public MustOverride Function GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions () As WebPartDescriptionCollection

summary.span: 返回目录中可用 控件的说明的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of descriptions of the available controls in a catalog.

returns.span: 一个 ，它包含目录中每个控件的 。

span.span: A that contains a for each control in a catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回在目录中的每个控件的说明信息。The method returns description information for each control in a catalog. 一个对象是包含有关的基本信息的轻量对象控件，包括其 ID，对该控件，并继承自基类的几个重要属性的值的对象引用类，如和。A object is a lightweight object that contains essential information about a control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the base class, such as and . 方法将会提升性能。The method improves performance. 创建目录后，它需要一些信息，包括标题、 说明、 图标 （如果存在） 和一个 id。 每个控件When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID. 而不是无需创建每个控件来获取此信息的实例，调用方可以使用方法，它将返回仅说明每个控件有关的信息。Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a caller can use the method, which returns only the description information about each control.

span.para: 方法是抽象的因此它必须由实现派生控件。此方法由包含的区域控件，并由关联对象时的内容呈现区域。
The method is abstract, so it must be implemented by derived controls. This method is called by the zone that contains a control, and by an associated object when the contents of a zone are rendered.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含 控件所在的 区域的当前状态。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回包含该区域的状态信息控件。The method returns information about the state of the zone that contains a control. 在字典中的窗体中返回的状态信息。The state information is returned in the form of a dictionary.

span.span: A that contains a reference to a specific .

summary.span: 从目录中检索 控件，该控件由传递给方法的 对象引用。

span.span: Retrieves from a catalog the control that is referenced by the object passed to the method.
A that is referenced by the object in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将返回从目录中的控件。The method returns a control from a catalog. 传递给方法的对象匹配特定控制和控制要返回的方法的实现。The object that is passed to the method matches a specific control and enables that control to be returned by the method. 如果目录包含不是派生自的服务器控件类中的，ASP.NET 服务器控件、 一个自定义服务器控件或用户控件，如控件必须包装与服务器控件控件，并返回控件从该方法。If a catalog contains a server control that does not derive from the class, such as an ASP.NET server control, a custom server control, or a user control, a control must wrap the server control with a control, and return the control from this method.

span.para: 方法是抽象的因此它必须由实现派生控件。此方法由包含的区域控件，由关联对象，并通过在网页上的对象。
The method is abstract, so it must be implemented by derived controls. This method is called by the zone that contains a control, by an associated object, and by the object on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性启用控件以获取对其区域的引用。The property enables a control to get a reference to its zone. 尽管该属性是只读的可以以编程方式更改区域本身的基本属性。Although the property is read-only, the underlying properties of the zone itself can be changed programmatically.
